title: Quarkus Newsletter #34 - July
content: Read "Quarkus 3.2.0.Final released - New security features, @QuarkusComponentTest" by Guillaume Smet" to learn about major changes like; various new security features, the ability to test CDI components with @QuarkusComponentTest and new build time analytics. Kevin Dubois' article "Managing Java containers with Quarkus and Podman Desktop" shows how to build...
